trans-unit.source: Defines the different types of assembly version compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 定義不同型別的組件版本相容性。

trans-unit.source: This feature is not available in version 1.0 of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 此功能在 .NET Framework 1.0 版中無法使用。

trans-unit.source: `AssemblyVersionCompatibility` defines the compatibility of an assembly with other versions of the same assembly, indicating if it cannot execute side-by-side with other versions (for example, due to conflicts over a device driver).
trans-unit.target: `AssemblyVersionCompatibility` 定義與其他版本的相同組件，表示是否它不能執行與其他版本 （例如，由於裝置驅動程式透過衝突） 並存相容性的組件。

trans-unit.source: If no compatibility is specified, an assembly is side-by-side compatible in all scopes.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了不相容性，則組件是在所有範圍中的並存相容。

trans-unit.source: An assembly cannot be more specific with regard to exactly which previous versions it is not side-by-side compatible with.
trans-unit.target: 組件的範圍不能與完全的舊版本不是由並存相容。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, if the `AssemblyVersionCompatibility` is specified, it means the assembly is non side-by-side with all know versions.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果`AssemblyVersionCompatibility`指定，則表示組件的非由並存所有知道版本。

trans-unit.source: If not specified, it means it is side-by-side with all known versions.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定，則表示它是由並行與所有已知的版本。

trans-unit.source: The assembly cannot execute with other versions if they are executing in the same application domain.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件在相同的應用程式定義域中執行時，就無法與其他版本一起執行。

trans-unit.source: The assembly cannot execute with other versions if they are executing on the same machine.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件在相同的電腦上執行，就無法與其他版本一起執行。

trans-unit.source: The assembly cannot execute with other versions if they are executing in the same process.
trans-unit.target: 如果組件在相同的處理序中執行，就無法與其他版本一起執行。
